description: Pattern learning engine stuck in calibration phase, never graduating to active learning. User experience degraded.
commonCauses: Insufficient scan volume to complete calibration
Scan quality too low for calibration
solutions: Implement phase timeout to force progression
Reduce calibration requirements for inactive users
Add manual phase override for debugging
Log phase transition attempts and failures
Provide phase progress feedback to user
Reset phase state if stuck for extended period
prevention: Test phase transitions with various usage patterns
Monitor phase distribution in user base
Provide clear progress indicators to users
examples: enum class LearningPhase { CALIBRATION, ACTIVE, EXPERT }
